author: J14T14
title: Nice little set for Beginner Builders
review:
The LEGO® Basic line in general was a great line for young kids that are not playing with Duplo anymore and want to get into they system bricks, much like today's LEGO Juniors line. This set is a great example of this. It comes with 46 common pieces of the time and comes with a few nice surprises.

The best parts in the set ate the classic 2x2 printed eye bricks and the 2x4 smile/ frown printed brick. Another great piece is the rarer 4x12 green brick. I would have likes to get more of these larger bricks as bases, but we don't see them anymore.

The box has some nice suggestions of things that you can build including some buildings, some animals, and a person.

Overall, this was a great set for beginners and a nice parts expansion pack for older builders.
